description_html:
A sleek, modern form that complements a range of architectural and design sensibilities. Accommodates
a wide variety of clean, minimal mounting options: surface mount fixed or adjustable, wall mount updown
or downlight, and suspended mount pendant or adjustable stem. High-output, dimmable Citizen
LED modules available in 80, 90, or 97 CRI. Easy on-site adjustment with toolless hot-aim up to 90° tilt
and 365° rotation. Proprietary field-changeable optics provide for quick interchangeability between
beam spreads of 15°, 25°, 40°, and 60°, with delivered efficacies ranging from 47 to 73 lm/W.
Interior / wet exterior.
